text: Went today and there was a line out the door. A worker who was not scheduled to work helped  them out. We need more people like her in this world. The other server was doing a fantastic job keeping up !!!

text: This was the best pizza hut I have been to. The workers were fast, friendly and very helpful. The food was quick, hot, on time and made  correctly. My only problem is that I live to far to make this a local hangout.  Way to go guys will definitely stop by if in your area.

text: This is a great place to order pizza if you want it to show up 2 and a half hours after you place the order. To top it off they will make sure they bring a cold pizza. In no way did they try to make the situation better. Would leave 0 stars if I could.
